title: Timeline Visualization
description: View campaign events in chronological order
noEventsDescription: This campaign doesn't have any events yet. Create events to visualize them on the timeline.
selectWorldAndCampaign: Please select a world and campaign to view the timeline visualization.
timelineSettingsDescription: Configure timeline display and behavior options.
enhancedTimelineDescription: Using the new React Timeline Editor with hierarchical grouping, advanced filtering, and conflict detection.
showTimelineMarkersDescription: Display today markers and other timeline indicators
enableTimelineEditingDescription: Allow creating, editing, and moving timeline events
